pH.interpretation: The pH is slightly acidic, ideal for oil palm nutrient uptake.

nitrogen.interpretation: Nitrogen levels indicate soil fertility and nutrient availability.

phosphorus.interpretation: Phosphorus is critical for root development and energy transfer.

potassium.interpretation: Potassium supports water regulation and disease resistance.

nitrogen.interpretation: Leaf nitrogen reflects protein synthesis capacity.

potassium.interpretation: Leaf potassium affects photosynthesis and water use.
